data.sql: create temporary table cc_t select CostCenter from CDT GROUP BY CostCenter;
create temporary table temp select SUM(Hours) AS Individual_Total_Hours, PersonnelNo, Name, CostCenter, LM from CDT GROUP BY PersonnelNo, Name, CostCenter, LM;
select *, (Individual_Total_Hours / 168) AS UR from temp where CostCenter = (select CostCenter from cc_t limit %s,1) order by UR DESC limit 5;
